transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Sir, can I call you tomorrow sir? Actually I am on the way sir. I am your account manager, my name is Yashika. But I will call tomorrow, okay?
Executive: Ma'am, Hindi mein baat karo.
Customer: Okay, okay, okay sir. Sir, mera naam Yashika hai, main aapki account manager hu but abhi main on the way hu. Kya main aapko kal morning mein call karu?
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Actually aapke jo sales person hai jo ma'am hai unhone mujhe inform kar diya tha aaj din mein. But actually abhi mere paas aapka data na pura transfer nahi hua hai. That's why maine aapko call nahi kiya. But maine aapka account pura check kar liya tha. But main aapko kal aapki aage meeting karke wo sari cheeze karati hu proper, thik hai?
Executive: Ma'am, main do din se wait kar raha hu ki call aayega khud se lekin aaya nahi abhi tak.
Customer: Nahi actually sir wo data thoda matlab transfer hone mein time lagta hai na isliye thoda call mein time lag raha hai. Pura mere paas data aayega, sari cheeze aayengi tabhi main aapko call karungi, okay?
Executive: Aur leads leads wagera kab aayengi?
Customer: Leads wagera to
Haan, main kal aapko kyuki sir jab tak leads wagera aayengi tabhi data uski ko data transfer bolte hai sir. To don't worry, do ya teen din lagte hai.
Executive: Suno, abhi jo hamari kaam ki leads aa rahi hai to fir hum abhi wo leads utha rahe hai. To abhi hamare paas wo 10 lead hai.
Haan.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Unme se hum utha rahe hai.
Customer: Haan to koi dikkat nahi hai uthao but main to kahungi ki mat uthaiye kyuki abhi aapko sari cheeze pata nahi hai. Main aapko acche se pehle train karungi, kaise use karna hai, kya karna hai tab aap kariyega. Abhi ruk, abhi do teen din ruk jaaiye, thik hai?
Executive: Ab humne to utha li.
Customer: Ab aap na koi baat nahi, koi nahi, nahi nahi sir ab wo to sir koi baat nahi lekin aapko every week milti hai. Har hafte milengi na sir pure saal, don't worry.
Haan.
Customer: Har hafte aapko 17 buyleads milengi. To uska le leable wali jo hoti hai na leads 10.
Executive: Jo leads leable wali jo hoti hai na leads 10.
Customer: Haan wo wali aap use mat kariyega sir. karaoge?
Executive: Ha wo wali aap use mat kariyega sir. Wapas karaoge?
Customer: Wapas kyu karenge provide aapko sir wo ek baat batao aap.
Executive: Ab aapka call nahi aa raha to hum kya karenge fir ye batao aap.
Customer: To sir wo data pura data transfer hone mein time lagta hai sir. Aap samjhiye to.
Executive: [unintelligible]
Customer: Sir actually main aapko sir kal morning mein call karti hu. Please actually main on the way hu aur kyuki mere paas abhi koi account maine open nahi kiya hua hai to mujhe kuch pata nahi hai.
Executive: Aapki baat sahi hai ma'am. Maine Gulabsha ma'am ko bhi call kiya wo attend nahi kar rahi.
Customer: Haan unhone, nahi unhone mujhe call karke bata diya hai sir. Unki call aayi thi mere paas.
Executive: Abhi Akbar bhaiya se baat ki hai tab unhone bola ki kal tak karwa dunga main.
Customer: Haan sir to thoda wait kar lijiye.
Executive: Maine ma'am ko bola ki bhaiya maine aapko
Customer: Main aapko call nahi karta to aap to mujhe bhul hi jaate ki kaam karna hai.
Executive: Main aapko call nahi karta to aap to mujhe bhul hi jaate ki kaam karna hai.
Customer: Nahi sir aisa nahi hai. Wo data jaise hi account manager ke paas transfer hota hai wo same day aapko call karta hai. But abhi mere paas wo aayi nahi hai welcome call aapki actually. Wo puri welcome call aati hai mere paas data aayega tab main aapko puri schedule ke sath aapko meeting arrange karungi. Nishchint rahiye, main hi aapki account manager hu.
Executive: Koi baat nahi ma'am.
Customer: Itna time nahi lagna chahiye ma'am.
Executive: Itna time nahi lagna chahiye ma'am.
Customer: Nahi lagega sir. Bas ye ek starting mein time lagta hai uske baad koi time nahi lagega sir, don't worry.
Executive: Kya naam hai ma'am aapka?
Customer: Yashika.
Executive: Yashika.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Okay, thik hai aap kal mujhe kitne baje call karoge?
Customer: Sir main waise bhi 9:30 baje office pahuch jaati hu main 9:30 baje kar lungi aapko agar mere paas data aa gaya hoga to.
Executive: Itni jaldi nahi, aap 10:00 baje tak karna.
Customer: Thik hai 10:00 baje tak kar lungi.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Okay, thik hai sir.
Executive: Thik hai ma'am.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know when leads will come.

- Executive says he picked up 10 leads.

- Executive complains about the delay in receiving calls.



Resolution:

- Executive will receive a call the next day.

- Executive was asked not to use leads.

- Executive was informed about weekly buyleads.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, data transfer, account manager
